question: 次の線形方程式を解いてください。\( \left\{\begin{array}{l}12 x_{1} + 48 x_{2} = 36\\3 x_{1} + 12 x_{2} = 9\\x_{1} + 4 x_{2} = 3\\\end{array}\right. \)
